text:
Two held for murder

The police on Monday arrested two persons for allegedly murdering S. Vigneshkumar (23), a BJP functionary at Kavundampalayam during Pongal celebrations. The arrested were: R. Saravanan alias Kuruvi (24), and Sarath alias Sarath Kumar (25) of Kavundampalayam.

Child’s body found

The body of girl child was found in an open drainage along the Sowripalayam-Masakalipalayam Road near Sowripalayam on Tuesday. The police said that the baby could be less than a day old. Efforts were on to identify her mother.

Protest

Twenty seven members of the Campus Front of India staged a demonstration in front of the South Taluk Office condemning the Union Government for the suicide of Dalit scholar Rohith Vemula, at the Hyderabad Central University. They claimed that he was a victim of institutional murder, and sought a probe by a judge. They said that action should be taken against Union Ministers who were alleged to be involved in the turn of events that resulted in his death.
